casebody.data:
State
v.
Bernard George Lamp, Jr. 222A14-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 9, 2016

Anne M. Gomez, Kathleen M. Joyce, Constance E. Widenhouse, Assistant Appellate Defenders, G. Glenn Gerding, Attorney at Law, For Lamp, Bernard George (Jr.).

Robert C. Montgomery, Amy Kunstling Irene, Special Deputy Attorney Generals, Sarah Kirkman, District Attorney, Kathleen N. Bolton, Assistant Attorney General, For State of North Carolina.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 6th of April 2016 by Defendant to File Juror Questionnaires Under Seal:

"Motion Dismissed as moot by order of the Court in conference, this the 9th of June 2016."
